name: The Wooden Castle
description:
This game is currently in development and more levels will be added soon.

Summary

You, the player, suddenly enter a big castle and the door shuts behind you. There is only a wooden sign in front of you and some conveniently placed images and letters in the wall. You approach that wooden sign and suddenly it SPEAKS. Sir Woody the 3rd is his name and he is here to help you... Or is he really?

  • Full keyboard & mouse support.
  • Full XBOX ONE and PS4 controller support.
DISCLAIMER

Castle Puzzle is made within the bounds of my first semesters' project in SAE College and is solely developed by me.

The game is made with high-quality free assets and given much love.

-Assets Used-

Sprites: OpenGameArt.org , assetStore.unity.com

Sounds: OpenGameArt.org , freesound.org

Fonts: DaFont.com
